summary.title: Career Summary
summary.body: As a student at both gymnasial and University level, I have been engaged in varous concils related to my studies. Working as a software consultant alongside my studies have yielded me great experience in how projects develop and has also allowed me to test the waters in a large variety of programming paradigms.

jolix.title: Software consulting

projects.title: Projects
projects.tt: Backend development of a checkout system for organizations using C#, Node.js & microservices
projects.mh: Backend development of a message listener for IoT-devices reporting back to a central hub using Node.js
projects.storm: Integrating customers to a Storm API in C#

jolix.body: Jolix is an IT consulting company specializing in E-commerce applications. At Jolix, I have worked on plenty of projects within varying programming environments. The company also runs a small electronics store in Boden named pålyset.se, in which I have worked as a clerk.

lm.title: Event organizer

roles.title: Roles
roles.admin: Head of administration (2019 - 2020): Bookings for hotel, catering, and trips for the whole event. Managing registrations for schools, students, and exhibitors.
roles.communication: Head of communication and marketing (2021 - Present): Designs for mailings. Communication with schools and students. Upkeep of the website. Photography and social media.

lm.body: Lise Meitner-dagarna is a yearly weekend-seminar in Stockholm for high-school students interested in physics. During three intensive days, the students get to partake in laboratory experiments, exhibitions and lectures by prominent physicists in a variety of fields. The organizing group consists of 4 members, and about 130 students from all over Sweden attend the event each year.

bjorknas.title: Gymnasium

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.programmeadvisoryboard: Chairman in the Programme Advisory Board for the Natural sciences' programme
achievements.studentcouncil: Chairman in the Student Council for Björknäsgymnasiet
achievements.naturprize: Scholarship from the Natural sciences' programme for distinctive performance
achievements.cern: Attendee of a two-week long internship at CERN (HSSIP)
achievements.wallenberg: Finalist in Wallenbergs fysikpris (Swedish national physics competition) and competitor in the Nordic-Baltic Physics Olympiad (NBPhO)
achievements.berzelius: Attendee of Berzeliusdagarna, a weekend-seminar for students interested in chemistry
achievements.rfs: Attendee of Rymdforskarskolan, a 2-week programme at Esrange space center

bjorknas.body: A three-year programme at Björknäsgymnasiet involving the Natural sciences'.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.programmeadvisoryboard: Student representative in the Programme Advisory Board for the Bachelor's Programme in Physics
achievements.studentfacultycouncil: Vice Chairman in the Student Faculty Council for Physics students
achievements.mathprizes: Recipient of three prices from the Mathematical Society at Uppsala University for distinctive performance in the courses Geometry and Calculus I, Geometry and Calculus III, and Fourier Analysis

bachelor.body: A three-year programme at Uppsala University covering a large portion the fundamental physics - from classical mechanics to advanced quantum physics. The programme also involves plenty of rigour in mathematics and a lot of programming.

engagements.title: Engagements
engagements.bannercarrier: Banner carrier for Norrland's nation (Student association in Uppsala)
engagements.hp: Test supervisor at the Swedish Scholastic Aptitude Test (Högskoleprovet, SweSAT)

bachelor.name: Bachelor Project in Physics
bachelor.title: Neural network neutrino direction reconstruction
bachelor.description: In plain English: Where did that particle come from? Let's mimmic a brain to find out!
